title: Born in Flames
actors: Honey,Adele Bertei,Jean Satterfield,Florynce Kennedy,Becky Johnston,Kathryn Bigelow,Hillary Hurst,Eric Bogosian,Pat Place,Ron Vawter,Mark Boone Junior,Pat Murphy,Ed Bowes,Walter Scheuer,Peggy Lee Brennan
summary: In a future where a socialist government gains power, a group of women decides to organize and rebel.
